definitions.definition: Someone who inherits , or is designated to inherit, the property of another.
examples: My brother is the heir to our childhood house and yet has no interest in it.

definitions.definition: One who inherits, or has been designated to inherit, a hereditary title or office.
examples: As the heir to the British throne, the Prince of Wales is a very public figure.

definitions.definition: A successor in a role , representing continuity with the predecessor .

main_definition: Someone who inherits , or is designated to inherit, the property of another.
secondary_definitions: One who inherits, or has been designated to inherit, a hereditary title or office.
A successor in a role , representing continuity with the predecessor .
